name: Factorysation
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - WASD

Mine/Break - RMB

Interact - LMB

Hotbar selection - 1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8/9/0

Open Inventory - E

Close - Esc

Pick Up - F

Drop - Q
If you spawn on water, you cannot move so just restart the game(or just reload the page).

As a beginner, this is the first ever game I have actually published. This game is a project I challenged myself to. The challenge is to program a HTML5 game that is like Factorio or Minecraft(basically where I get inspirations from) using pure Javascript without any frameworks or game engines. The game has many imperfections and bugs. The game art is not really nice as I had to create them myself (By the way, the water is just there for procedural generation). It was a great learning experience  and I do recommend others to do so too because you have to create your own logic and algorithms. Feel free to feedback in the comments! :)
